sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p:
SLOANEA, in botany: A genus of plants belonging to the claſs of polyandria, and order of monogynia ; and in the natural ſyſtem ranging under the 50th order, A mentaceae. The corolla is pentapetalous ; the calyx pentaphyllous and deciduous ; the ſtigma is
perforated ; the berry is corticoſe, echinated, polyſpermous, and gaping. There are two species, the dentata and emarginata.
